tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compliance_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  company_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  regulation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
  last_audit_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name VARCHAR(255),
    compliance_status BOOLEAN,
    last_audit_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE IndustryStandards (
    standard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    standard_name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    company_id INT,
    audit_date DATE,
    compliance_result BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE compliance_records (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   company_id INT REFERENCES companies(id),
   standard_id INT REFERENCES standards(id),
   date_recorded DATE,
   compliance_level ENUM('Low', 'Medium', 'High')
);

CREATE TABLE regulations (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  regulation_name TEXT,
  description TEXT,
  compliance_status TEXT)
